name: Game Kids: Baseball Bash
description:
Join Kiko, Beamy and Ash as they try to stop X and his villianous army in a pong-like game with a baseball and comic book aesthetic.
Go up and down, hit balls and protect your base from hits.

Use the arrow keys to move up and down on the stage.
As a ball is coming towards you, press the Z key to kick it back at the enemy Hit the enemy with enough balls and you'll defeat him! 

Be careful! There's a machine behind you called "Striker". Make sure nothing hits it! With enough hits the machine will open up, capture you, and it'll be game over!





Kiko Kicker (aka Light-Blue)

Kiko is a shy, but electric (get it? cause super powers)
kid that after gaining his powers decided to become
the hero: Light-Blue!

He's a fast character, allowing him
to quickly move along the map to kick
the projectiles back at the enemies!

However, he's not the strongest out there,
making it so that it takes him a bit longer to
defeat certain bosses.

Beamy Ballonie

Beamy is Kiko's best friend! They've been an
unstoppable duo since they were young and
continue to save the world together!

She's not as fast as Kiko, however what she
lacks in speed she makes up in strength and skill!

Being a baseball fan, Beamy's bought her own
bat and is ready to use it!

Ash Newton (Non-playable) (Yet)

Kiko's younger yet smarter cousin!
Considered one of the smartest children in Brazil
at only 14 years old, Ash moved to Hill Top Island
and lives with his cousin Kiko.

While he doesn't participate directly in "the Bash",
Ash can be seen in the corner of the stages
using his talents and skills to hack the
villian's systems!

(Just ahm, just don't tell them I told ya that).

X-Army

An easy one to beat.
The X-Army is part of a group
of robots created by X to keep
the heroes occupied
"His body is an instrument of death" says X.

Dimentra

The quick and confused daughter of X
While she's not as slow as the X-Army, she's
also not as quick as her father.
She's the perfect equal in terms of power level
to our heroes.
She's also the only one that realizes
how dumb it is to battle with baseballs instead of their
powers but oh well.

Egghead

A criminal that turned himself into egg
yolk to escape from prison.
Egghead's egg-like armor not only gave him
his new name, but also allows him to
throw hard AND quick!
His armor is incredibly large however,
making it easy to land hits!

X

Quick like his daughter, strong like his
right hand egg, and precise like his robots!
The mastermind behind the "Bash",
X might possibly be the biggest challange
to our heroes!

Can you survive the "Bash"?
